channel.title: "Has some knowledge" Help fix run server batch file
channel.description:
Hi, Can someone help me figure out how to work the run server batch file for the Runescape Classic server I'm tying to run? -Facts: * I am knowledgeable of most the progress when it comes to tinkering with the settings "example: building up the Environmental Variables, installing Wamp, JDK, and apache to make it work."
* It does not matter if the server is online or not I just want to run the server content properly.
- What I am aware of:
* The laptop computers are Windows :palm: "Vista" and "Windows 8".
* I can't figure out what is going wrong with the run server batch file.
* I can't run Wamp on either of my windows laptop computers as it shuts down or does not run at all.
- Things to know about my batch files:
* The client batch only works for the windows vista for some strange reason * Jar file works for both the windows laptops
* This is the information that I got in the run server:
set PATH=%PATH%;C:\apache-ant-1.9.2\bin set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program\Java\jdk1.8.0 ant demonikp2p
* I also had this for the compile server:
@echo off set PATH=%PATH%;C:\apache-ant-1.9.2\bin set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program\Java\jdk1.8.0 ant -buildfile .\build.xml cls ant pause
* This is what I have for the environmental variables: Within the users variables...
CROSSPATH C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.8.0
PATH C:\apache-ant-1.9.2\bin

item.title: "Has some knowledge" Help fix run server batch file

item.title: "Has some knowledge" Help fix run server batch file
item.dc:creator: @Sladescowl Sladescowl
item.description:
@Sladescowl wrote:

Hi,
Can someone help me figure out how to work the run server batch file for the Runescape Classic server I’m tying to run?
-Facts:

  • I am knowledgeable of most the progress when it comes to tinkering with the settings “example: building up the Environmental Variables, installing Wamp, JDK, and apache to make it work.”

  • It does not matter if the server is online or not I just want to run the server content properly.

  • What I am aware of:

  • The laptop computers are Windows :palm: “Vista” and “Windows 8”.

  • I can’t figure out what is going wrong with the run server batch file.

  • I can’t run Wamp on either of my windows laptop computers as it shuts down or does not run at all.

  • Things to know about my batch files:

  • The client batch only works for the windows vista for some strange reason

  • Jar file works for both the windows laptops

  • This is the information that I got in the run server:

set PATH=%PATH%;C:\apache-ant-1.9.2\bin
set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program\Java\jdk1.8.0
ant demonikp2p

  • I also had this for the compile server:

@echo off
set PATH=%PATH%;C:\apache-ant-1.9.2\bin
set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program\Java\jdk1.8.0
ant -buildfile .\build.xml
cls
ant
pause

  • This is what I have for the environmental variables:
    Within the users variables…

CROSSPATH
C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.8.0

PATH
C:\apache-ant-1.9.2\bin

Read full topic
item.source: "Has some knowledge" Help fix run server batch file
